## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AbsoluteMetrics](./blockly.metricsmanager_namespace.absolutemetrics_interface.md) | Describes where the viewport starts in relation to the workspace SVG. |
|  [ContainerRegion](./blockly.metricsmanager_namespace.containerregion_interface.md) | All the measurements needed to describe the size and location of a container. |
|  [FixedEdges](./blockly.metricsmanager_namespace.fixededges_interface.md) | Describes fixed edges of the workspace. |
|  [ToolboxMetrics](./blockly.metricsmanager_namespace.toolboxmetrics_interface.md) | Describes the width, height and location of the toolbox on the main workspace. |
|  [UiMetrics](./blockly.metricsmanager_namespace.uimetrics_interface.md) | Common metrics used for UI elements. |
